description:
Changes in ec2utils.py cause "nova-manage image convert images $DIR/images" from contrinb/nova.sh fail because nova-manage expects only NotFound exception, but gets ugly ValueError instead.
I think, either nova-manage should be corrected to catch such errors or ec2_id_to_id should process ValueError, as it was.
title: Revision 1032 breaks uploading of old images

comments.content:
Changes in ec2utils.py cause "nova-manage image convert images $DIR/images" from contrinb/nova.sh fail because nova-manage expects only NotFound exception, but gets ugly ValueError instead.
I think, either nova-manage should be corrected to catch such errors or ec2_id_to_id should process ValueError, as it was.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yorik-sar

comments.content: Looks like this was fixed as of r1065. Can you confirm?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: Yes, this is almost exact workaround that we used.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yorik-sar
